rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a reception area and storage space for coats and shoes. Decorated in traditional Chettinad motifs.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living room integrated with a dining area, featuring high ceilings and large windows that invite natural light in keeping with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated space for dining adjacent to the kitchen, designed with Chettinad aesthetics and functional layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditional kitchen with ample counter space and storage, incorporating local materials and finishes.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office area designed for productivity, equipped with built-in shelves and ergonomic design, ensuring a quiet space away from the main living areas.

rooms.name: Open Terrace
rooms.description: An open terrace or veranda that overlooks the swimming pool area, providing a relaxing space with seating arrangements and decorative elements.
